abstract.para: The specifications and information regardin the products in this manual are subject to change. Check out its Gitlab repository in order to get the last version available. All statements, information and recomendations in this manual are believed to be accurate, but are presented without warranty of any kind, express or implied. Users must take full responsibility for their application of any products.

The software license and limited warranty for the accompanying product are set forth in the information packet that shipped with the product and are incorporated herein by this reference. If you are unable to locate the software license or limited warranty. contact redborder for a copy at info@redborder.com or leaving your personal data in our contact form at redborder.com
This material may be distributed only under the terms and conditions set forth in the GNU Free Documentation License v1.3 (the latest version is available at http://fsf.org/).

Check out the GNU Free Documentation License for more details. If you want you can receive a copy of it via redborder or directly check it out at https://www.gnu.org/licenses/fdl.html

address.street: Plaza de las Naciones s/n, Torre Norte (Edificio Aljarafe Center). Planta 12.
